title: Naturopathic Medicine and Medical Intuition
description: Dr Wallace is a Naturopathic doctor, Medical Intuitive Healer, Speaker, and teacher in Washington state.
cleaned_text: READY TO EMBODY YOUR EVOLUTION? Explore the uncharted territories of you! CLICK HERE FOR [THIS WEEK'S ENERGY REPORT](#section-1667189068900) Are you ready to work with a doctor who believes you have your own ability to heal? Which path to healing is the best for you? NATUROPATHIC MEDICINE Work with Dr. Wallace's unique energy medicine to address your chronic illness and/or to create a healthy life. [LEARN MORE](/resource_redirect/landing_pages/1862121) [](/resource_redirect/landing_pages/1865504) MEDICAL INTUITIVE READINGS Dr. Wallace intuitively "reads" the subtle factors that are contributing to your illness and health [LEARN MORE](/resource_redirect/landing_pages/1865504) [](https://www.draubreywallace.com/additional-healing-services) HEALING & BODYWORK Dr Wallace is a 3rd generation healer, Reiki Master, and Craniosacral therapist. Bodywork sessions integrate her 20+ years of bodywork experience with her intuitive gifts. [LEARN MORE](https://www.draubreywallace.com/additional-healing-services) You are the one you have been looking for. My goal is to empower you on your journey by creating the proper environment and the precise tools and treatments you need to encourage your body to be its own medicine. ABOUT MEET DR. AUBREY WALLACE Dr. Aubrey Wallace is a practicing Naturopathic Physician and Medical Intuitive in Washington State. She holds a Bachelor's degree in Cell Biology and Neuroscience from Montana State University and a Doctorate of Naturopathic Medicine from the National University of Health Sciences.
